title: MC_GearOut (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK MC_GearOut
This function block disengages the slave axis from the master axis.
Note
It is assumed that this command is followed by another command, as for instance
MC_Stop
,
MC_GearIn
.
If no further command follows, the default condition is: maintain last velocity.

rows.Name: Execute
rows.Comment: Rising edge: Starts the execution of the function block.

rows: TRUE: Execution of the function block has not been finished.
TRUE: Error has occurred within the function block.
